statements: SELECT * FROM knowledge_base WHERE id = 1;
SELECT query, response FROM knowledge_base WHERE id >= 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT entity FROM knowledge_base WHERE entity != 'person';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base WHERE response LIKE '%error%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, query FROM knowledge_base WHERE entity IS NULL;
SELECT id, query, response FROM knowledge_base WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT entity FROM knowledge_base WHERE query LIKE '%data%';
SELECT query, response, entity FROM knowledge_base WHERE response IS NOT NULL AND entity = 'science' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, query, response, entity FROM knowledge_base WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeBase;
SELECT topic, description FROM KnowledgeBase WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE deadline >= NOW();
SELECT task_name FROM Tasks WHERE task_id = 2;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM Tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT topic, description FROM KnowledgeBase WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeBase WHERE topic LIKE 'Programming%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, deadline FROM Tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT topic, description FROM KnowledgeBase WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE deadline < '2023-05-01' AND task_name LIKE '%Report%' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT doc_title, doc_content FROM documents WHERE doc_id = 2;
SELECT annotation_id, annotation_info FROM annotations WHERE doc_id = 2 AND task_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM annotations ORDER BY annotation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT doc_id, doc_title, doc_content FROM documents WHERE doc_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT annotation_id, doc_id, task_id, annotation_info FROM annotations WHERE doc_id = 1 AND task_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM tasks JOIN annotations ON tasks.task_id = annotations.task_id;
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT title, content FROM documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT annotation_text FROM annotations WHERE task_id = 2 AND document_id = 3;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT title, content FROM documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT task_id, task_name FROM tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT annotations.annotation_text, documents.title, tasks.task_name FROM annotations JOIN documents ON annotations.document_id = documents.id JOIN tasks ON annotations.task_id = tasks.task_id;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS user_count, username FROM users GROUP BY username HAVING user_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM NLP_Tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM NLP_Tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM NLP_Models WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT dataset_name FROM NLP_Datasets WHERE dataset_id = 3;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM NLP_Authors WHERE author_id = 2;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM NLP_Tasks;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM NLP_Models WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT dataset_name FROM NLP_Datasets ORDER BY dataset_name DESC;
SELECT result_id, result_details FROM NLP_Results WHERE dataset_id = 3 AND model_id = 2;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM NLP_Authors WHERE author_id > 5;
